  of Computer and Telecommunication Systems (MASCOTS 2020)§r

Version:§7v3 (Thu, 15 Apr 2021 06:50:45 GMT)§r

Comments: \u00a77\u00a7oCorrigendum to the MASCOTS 2020 paper. The following changes have been made: a) Re-calculation of the AoI for multiple classes to take full account of the presence of other-class packets b)correction of erroneous
statement about the equality of the AoI rightbound to the peak AoI. Clarifications on the extensibility of the analysis to other quasi-reversible queues are also provided\u00a7r
